txt.en:
'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert metalsmith! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan metalsmith, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert metalsmith in Thorin's Hall.

'If you impress Molda, he may allow you to use the superior forge to create strong armour from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert metalsmith! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'If you impress Molda, he may allow you to use the superior forge to create strong armour from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Crafting: A Superior Forge

'Well done, [placeholder]! You are truly ready to begin your journey as an artisan metalsmith and beyond. The superior forges can be found here in Thorin's Hall, as well as in many high-level areas throughout Middle-earth. I look forward to hearing of your renown as a great metalsmith!'
You have grown swiftly and steadily as a Metalsmith and are now nearly ready to begin using more advanced facilities. The superior forge awaits!
